targets.expr: aptos_storage_next_block_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} and aptos_backup_handler_epoch_ending_epoch

panels.title: Epoch Ending Backup: Epoch vs Latest Epoch

targets.expr: aptos_storage_latest_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} and aptos_backup_handler_transaction_version

panels.title: Transaction Backup: Version vs latest version

panels.description: State version of the snapshot being taken, compared to latest version of the ledger.
panels.title: State Snapshot: Version vs Latest Version

panels.description: Note the number of accounts is the latest, not that at specified version.
panels.title: State snapshot: Progress vs Total Accounts

panels.description: When the backup coordinator is live, this shows as a upward trend line.
panels.title: Backup Coordinator Heartbeats

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the backup-verify job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
aptos_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} * 1000
unless aptos_db_backup_verify_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > aptos_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless aptos_db_backup_verify_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > aptos_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(aptos_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_backup_verify_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_backup_verify_transaction_version[1m]) > 0)

panels.title: Job State

panels.description: Epoch of the epoch ending LedgerInfo verified

targets.expr: aptos_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} and irate(aptos_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m]) != 0

panels.title: Epoch Ending Epoch

panels.description: Version of the epoch ending LedgerInfo verified

targets.expr: aptos_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} and irate(aptos_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m]) != 0

panels.title: Epoch Ending Version

panels.description: Version of the state snapshot being verified
panels.title: State Snapshot Version

targets.expr: aptos_db_backup_verify_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} and irate(aptos_db_backup_verify_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m]) != 0

sum(irate(aptos_backup_service_sent_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", endpoint=~"$backup_service_api_name"}[1m])) by(kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) > 0

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the restore job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} * 1000
unless aptos_db_restore_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless aptos_db_restore_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(aptos_db_restore_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_transaction_save_version[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_transaction_replay_version[1m]) > 0) == bool 1

panels.title: Job State

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: Transaction Restore Progress

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the restore job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} * 1000
unless aptos_db_restore_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless aptos_db_restore_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > aptos_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(aptos_db_restore_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_transaction_save_version[1m]) > 0 or rate(aptos_db_restore_transaction_replay_version[1m]) > 0) == bool 1

panels.title: Job State

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: Transaction Restore Progress

panels.description:
"Committed" version is the version on the latest ledger info saved.

"Synced" version is the version on the latest transaction saved, it's only different when state-sync is working to catch up with peers.
panels.title: Committed and Synced Versions
